pr_title: Ibis4Test4Linux: All tests that are active by default, except ANT files

timeline.message: Ibis4Test4Linux: Make Base64Pipe solution more general

Ibis4Test4Linux: Remove c:\temp until FilePipe

Not yet done: take care for path separator

Apply property testdata.dir instead of log.dir

Only c:\temp kept in ANT files; awaiting pull request to substitute properties there
Ibis4Test4Linux: Finish all scenarios that are active by default, except ANT files

timeline.bodyText: Ik zou het mooier vinden als je de archive-out-check.xml terugnoemt naar archive-out.xml en de step8.java.RestSender_GetDoc.write als value get-in.xml noemt oid. dan is het duidelijker welke in's en out's bij elkaar horen.
timeline.author: nielsm5
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -13,7 +13,7 @@ step1.dir.init.write = 01/dummy.txt
 step2.java.XmlQuerySender.write = 01/xqs-init-in.xml
 step3.java.XmlQuerySender.read = 01/xqs-init-out.xml
 step4.java.RestSender_ArchiveDoc.write = 01/archive-in.xml
-step5.java.RestSender_ArchiveDoc.read = 01/archive-out.xml
+step5.java.RestSender_ArchiveDoc.read = 01/archive-out-check.xml
 step6.java.XmlQuerySender.write = 01/xqs-select-in.xml
 step7.java.XmlQuerySender.read = 01/xqs-select-out.xml
 step8.java.RestSender_GetDoc.write = 01/archive-out.xml

timeline.bodyText: Je gebruikt hier nu een regex maar is dat nog wel nodig? Geven verschillende adapters de resultaten in een ander format terug? (hoofd/kleine-letters en back/forward-spaces)
timeline.author: nielsm5
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -45,15 +45,28 @@ scenariosroot3.m2e.pom.properties=../META-INF/maven/org.ibissource/ibis-adapterf
 scenariosroot4.directory=../../../../src/test/resources/TestTool
 scenariosroot4.description=Jetty Maven Plugin
 
-local.temp=c:/temp
-#local.temp=C:/Data/BuildCompare/temp
-#scenariosroot2.directory=${local.temp}/testtool
-#scenariosroot2.description=no-D-partition
-
 #larva.adapter.active=false
 #larva.adapter.scheduler.active=false
 larva.adapter.mail.active=false
 larva.adapter.writeToSystemOut=true
 larva.adapter.execute=IbisConsole
 # Other examples:
 #larva.adapter.execute=EsbSoapValidator
+
+testdata.dir.match=${log.dir.match}[\\\\/]testdata
+
+# catalina.properties you need for Windows:
+# -----------------------------------------
+
+# otap.stage=LOC
+# log.dir=c:/temp
+#
+# The directory represented by ${log.dir} can appear in different ways under Windows.
+# Supply this regex to match every possible way.
+#
+# Comment on the value chosen for Windows. This expression matches:
+#   c:/temp
+#   c:\temp
+#   C:/temp
+#   C:\temp
+# log.dir.match=[cC]:[\\\\/]temp

timeline.message: Ibis4Test4Linux: Revert init.xml files to prevent merge conflicts
